best_gem_comment: I loved this class. By far one of my favorite courses I have taken at Harvard. While this is a gem in terms of content and fun working with microscopes, you do need to go to lecture and engage with the content as the optics part can be challenging. Also the grading is a bit lagged so you have to really be on top of your grades to make sure you are not failing!
best_gem_comment_short: While this is a gem in terms of content and fun working with microscopes, you do need to go to lecture and engage with the content as the optics part can be challenging.

best_gem_comment: TAKE THIS CLASS. It is a gem for sure but make sure to actually go to lecture so that final doesn’t rock you like it did me :)
best_gem_comment_short: It is a gem for sure but make sure to actually go to lecture so that final doesn’t rock you like it did me :)
